metadata.title: CVE-2015-8922 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The read_CodersInfo function in archive_read_support_format_7zip.c inlibarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a crafted 7z file, relatedto the _7z_folder struct.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
